correction.p: OCR generated transcript has not been corrected.

normalization.p: Only minor normalization where needed, if any, is indicated via markup.

punctuation.p: All punctuation marks in the source text have been retained, and are represented by appropriate Unicode code points.
Punctuation may be marked up with pc elements for clarification, but not exclusively.

quotation.p: All quotation marks have been retained, and are represented by appropriate Unicode code points.

hyphenation.p: Hyphenated words that appear at the end of a line have been retained. The hyphen, if present, is represented by the Unicode code point, and marked up with a pc element. The break="no" attribute on the lb element indicates that a single word is split across the lines.

interpretation.p: Dates, places, and names may be marked up, where useful.

body.ab:
Edwin Sands Born in England
in the 15 century was made
Archbishop of York by Queen
Elizabeth, had 2 Sons James & John
A Record of the Sands Family
first from James Sands Who came from
England where he was Born 1622 came to
America 1638. Married Sarah Walker
of Porttsmouth R. I, 1647 moved to Block
Island where he Died March 13th, 1695, had
6 Children, John, Sarah, Mary, James, Samuel
Edward, second his Son James was Born Block
Island 1671, moved to Lond Isl. 1696,
Married Mary (Russel) Cornell 1697, died
1731, had 9 nine Children, Othiniel, Mary,
Abijah, James, John, Susanah, Bathsheba,
Jemrushe, Sarah,
Othiniel Born, Long Island, 1699,
Married, 1723, to Susanah Daughter
of Nicholas Lang, Moved to Bedford
Westchester, Co, NY, 1746, Died 1757,
had eleven 11 Children, William, James,
Caleb, John L, Othiniel, Samuel, Joshua
Susanah, Sarah, and Mary.
Othiniel Born, January 27, 1733
at Long Island Married Married Martha
Ketchum 1750
he had six Children, John, Ruth, Samuel
Jessee, Martha, Nathaniel, — — —
Jessee, Born, June 7 seventh 1768
Married, Mary Daughter of John Pardee
Feb 20,th 1800, had Four children
Harvey, John P, Sarah W, Mary.
Harvey Maried Sally Haasze Feb 27, 1822
John P.. to Candace Gaylord June, 8th 1826
Sarah, W, to Willis H Gaylord June, 7th 1826
Mary, Married George Harrison Feb 19th, 1835
Has five Children. William N, Henry F,
Emma A, John J, Sarah A,
William N, Born June 19,th 1837--
Henry F, Born, May 24,th 1840,
Emma A, Born May 27,th 1843
John J, Born July 13,th 1845
Sarah A, Born January 19, 1848
Peekskill Westchester Co NY
BrotherCaleb Sands
Othaniel SandsBorn1733jan27th
Martha (Ketchum) Sands〃June14th1735
ChildrenJohn Sands.〃Oct251761Children. Nathaniel, Henry, William James. B. Betsyan Martha Margarett gerusha Rosanah
Ruth Sands〃Dec25th1763. . .none
Samuel SandsApril16th1766. . . .Betsy, James, Reuben Elias
Jessee Sands〃June7th1768. . . .Harvy John P Sarah W. Mary E
Martha SandsJuly61771. . . .none
Nathaniel Sands〃Aug201773. . . .none
[family tree chart shows decendants from Othanial Sands:] Jessee Sands... Harvey. John J. Sarah W. Mary. [Harvey's children:] Michael [married?:] Emily Lewis Joshua Martha Erastus George Rosanah Jane Laura William [John J.'s children:] [Parmelia?] Jereme Lydia Mary Jane [written above other names] Ezra Aurelia Charlie Markus
Willis, H Gaylord Born May 17, 1804.
Sarah, W Sands October 29th 1805
Hornby
Willis, H. Gaylord Was Married
to Sarah W Sands June 7th 1826
Children Born
Adaline E Gaylord Born Feb 2 1827
Sophia L Gaylord Feb January 23rd
1829, Died April 14th 1863
Cornelia L Gaylord January 19th 1831
Cornelia Died 3 children sept 9th 1870
Franklin Gaylord April 30th 1833
Franklin Died, Dec. 3rd 1867, 2 children
Melvina, Gaylord, July 31st 1836
Melvina, Died April 1st 1886
Alonzo Jessee Gaylord Nov 12 1838
Alonzo J Died October, 14 1862
Mary, Eliz Gaylord Febuary 2, 1841
Lucius Marvin, Gaylord, March 29th, 1843
Marcus Gaylord, August 14th 1845
Willis B Gaylord, August, 29th 1849
Died March 26th 1853
Adaline, G married Josiah Underwood
August 4th 1853 Children 4
Sophia G to O. Hendrick, oct, 12, 1854
Cornelia to Geo. Kelsey, oct 23rd 1859
3 Children) (two Children
Franklin to Mary Grey April 4th 1860
Mary, E, to Henry Greey Sept 22, 1864
Sophia & Melvina & Mary no children
Melvina to Wm H Green oct 7th 1875
Lucius M to Irene Egbert April, 14
1876 3 Children none living
Alonzo, J, unmaried
Marcus to Gabriella Shannon
Febuary 22 1877, 4 Children
Willis, B. Died, 4 years old
